description:
Ōtani`s non-challant "Gimme some valentine`s day chocolates" makes Lisa jump with joy.
But Ōtani still doesn`t understand Lisa`s feelings whatsoever.
After Nakao explains to him how much effect a single word from him has on Lisa, Ōtani realizes what he did.
When Lisa comes to hand him her crush chocolate, Ōtani says he`s not in a position to accept them.
Throwing the chocolates at him, Lisa says she doesn`t care because that the crush chocolate is just a reflection of her true feelings.
Could Ōtani`s emotions be quavering?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai o Torimodose! Honmei Choco de Onna o Migaku!!
Reclaim Your Love! Improve Femininity With True Love Chocolate!!
愛を取り戻せ! 本命チョコで女を磨く!!
